channel.title: [Rework Suggestion] The Sorcerer and The Inquisitor
channel.description:
Here's a Sorcerer and Inquisitor rework that attempts to make the Sorcerer and Inquisitor each other's worst enemy, and forces the BD to rely on the Inquisitor to deal with the Sorcerer and to a lesser degree make the Unseen/Cult rely on the Sorcerer to deal with the Inquisitor. > ## [color=magenta]The Sorcerer[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Killer[/color]** **Mage Armour (Passive)** - Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding. Does not apply to attacks from **[color=orangered]The Inquisitor[/color]**. **Awareness (Passive)** - You will not attack targets that are death immune, guarded by The Knight, or are an Unseen/Cult member. Additionally, your visits are hidden at night. **Magic Cloak (Day)** - You appear as a class type of your choice and a member of the Blue Dragon to investigations tonight. - 2 uses **Magic Missile (Night)** - Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. Bypasses **[color=orangered]The Inquisitor[/color]**'s night immunity. - Infinite uses **Circle of Death (Night)** - The target player **and** anyone visiting them will die. - 3 uses, killing **[color=orangered]The Inquisitor[/color]** activates this ability _Survive to see the Blue Dragon lose._
> ## [color=orangered]The Inquisitor[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Investigative[/color]** **Holy Blessing (Passive)** - Immune to death, once. Does not apply to attacks from **[color=magenta]The Sorcerer[/color]**. **Nobody Expects The Spanish Inqusition (Passive)** - Your visits will be hidden from others at night. **Consecration (Day)** - The target player is immune to attacks **[color=magenta]The Sorcerer[/color]** makes against them tonight. You can't target yourself. - 2 uses **Find Magic (Night)** - Check if a player is a magic user. The Paladin, Court Wizard, Psychic and their converted forms are all magic users. - Infinite uses **Ruthless Efficiency (Night)** - Attack a target player. Bypasses **[color=magenta]The Sorcerer[/color]**'s night immunity. - 3 uses _Survive to see The Sorcerer die. (Commits suicide when goal is complete)_

item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
well I can say I get the point of this rework, the idea behind it is currently the the sorc’s abilities are amazingly strong at completely negating the inq’s ability to find or kill him, and completely vulnerable to everything that the BD would use to catch any other NK. I see the point of this rework is to make the sorcerer nearly impossible to catch without the Inqs help…

item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Sam17z:

it makes it harder for the BD to find the sorcerer.

That’s the point, basically.

Sam17z:

I think 2 uses of this is enough, it prevents against all BD invests. So from princess to observer, I feel like this is way to strong.

Yeah, that’s fair.

Sam17z:

The cult are no longer magic users?

Well, any CW/Psychic that is converted to the cult still is, but otherwise the cult aren’t. This is to prevent the BD having too many reasons to prevent the Inquisitor from reaching their win condition, and to make Find Magic more accurate to counterbalance the Sorcerer being better able to disguise themselves as BD.

Here’s a Sorcerer and Inquisitor rework that attempts to make the Sorcerer and Inquisitor each other’s worst enemy, and forces the BD to rely on the Inquisitor to deal with the Sorcerer and to a lesser degree make the Unseen/Cult rely on the Sorcerer to deal with the Inquisitor.

The Sorcerer

Neutral Killer
Mage Armour (Passive) - Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding. Does not apply to attacks from The Inquisitor.
Awareness (Passive) - You will not attack targets that are death immune, guarded by The Knight, or are an Unseen/Cult member. Additionally, your visits are hidden at night.
Magic Cloak (Day) - You appear as a class type of your choice and a member of the Blue Dragon to investigations tonight. - 2 uses
Magic Missile (Night) - Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. Bypasses The Inquisitor’s night immunity. - Infinite uses
Circle of Death (Night) - The target player and anyone visiting them will die. - 3 uses, killing The Inquisitor activates this ability
Survive to see the Blue Dragon lose.

The Inquisitor

Neutral Investigative
Holy Blessing (Passive) - Immune to death, once. Does not apply to attacks from The Sorcerer.
Nobody Expects The Spanish Inqusition (Passive) - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.
Consecration (Day) - The target player is immune to attacks The Sorcerer makes against them tonight. You can’t target yourself. - 2 uses
Find Magic (Night) - Check if a player is a magic user. The Paladin, Court Wizard, Psychic and their converted forms are all magic users. - Infinite uses
Ruthless Efficiency (Night) - Attack a target player. Bypasses The Sorcerer’s night immunity. - 3 uses
Survive to see The Sorcerer die. (Commits suicide when goal is complete)
